Chiropractor serving Droitwich, Worcester and Bromsgrove communities

Living a healthy life means being pain free, it also means having the ability to fully participate in life. Our Holistic Health Process helps you get out of pain and achieve long-term wellbeing. We have 2 goals for you: 1. Get you feeling and moving better quickly 2. Improve the function of your body so you can continue to do what you love. We achieve these goals by focusing on rehabilitation, exercise, good nutrition and stress reduction as essential adjuncts to chiropractic treatment. The Holistic Health Process ensures that you receive a far longer term benefit from you chiropractic treatment - this way you get the most out of life.

Meet the Doctor

Dr. Andrew Robson

BSC (HONS) MCHIRO

Andrew initially qualified as a chiropractor because he wanted to help improve other people’s lives in the same way that a chiropractor had improved his. Several years of competitive rowing, including international events, had left him with regular back pain and discomfort.

About Dr. Andrew Robson

Our Process

We Listen.

Our complimentary consult is a time for us to listen carefully to how your problem affects your daily life. The doctor will take a thorough clinical history and ask about your goals for your health. The purpose of this stage is to clarify the problem and determine whether chiropractic can help you meet your goals.

Examination

Our comprehensive examination process includes neurological, orthopedic, and musculoskeletal tests designed to establish an accurate diagnosis.

Personalized Treatment

Once the doctor has established a diagnosis, he will tailor a treatment plan specific to your needs and your health goals.

Prevention

When your initial goals have been met, we may recommend periodic maintenance adjustments, specific rehabilitation exercises, or lifestyle changes to help prevent problems from returning.
